name: 4chan True Flag Dimensions
description: Changes 4chan flags to their actual dimensions and updates/improves many flags.
additional_info:
This theme is mostly finished but some flags are still a work in progress. Created by Sydney anon from /flag/ + /extraflags/ (/int/). v1.3

If flags suddenly misalign check the style for updates. Changelog available on the GitHub.

https://github.com/shoal3/TrueFlagDimensions
